snippet.title: Ember Sword Gameplay Sneak Peek Teaser (2019)
snippet.description:
Pre-register: https://EmberSword.com
Ember Sword is an upcoming Free-to-Play fantasy sandbox MMORPG playable directly in your browser or through a desktop client.

This gameplay preview snippet of Ember Sword is the earliest in-game footage share publicly, but there's so much more coming soon! Thanks to our fantastic community for the amazing support over the past months - we've got a ton more coming your way throughout 2019, like soundtracks, concept art, character reveals, FAQ videos, gameplay snippets, and much more! :)

Join the community on Discord to chat with us directly: https://discord.gg/46P8rFs

TWITTER: http://twitter.com/PlayEmberSword
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/PlayEmberSword
REDDIT: http://reddit.com/r/EmberSword

Ember Sword is a modern rewrite of the games industry business model in favor of the user, and a love letter to MMORPG gamers. It's instantly playable, has a classless combat system and a player-controlled world, and NO lootboxes!
